Shop.title: Our Premium Fabric Collection
Shop.description: Discover handpicked, high-quality fabrics perfect for your next masterpiece. From luxurious silk to breathable cotton, each material is carefully selected to bring your creative vision to life.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.aboutText: Scorpio Textiles is a premium fabric provider based in Jakarta. We specialize in high-quality materials including Silk, Cotton, Linen, and Velvet. Our mission is to provide the finest fabrics for fashion designers, tailors, and textile enthusiasts across Indonesia and beyond.
